summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department, authorizing acceptance of Amendment No. 2 to Utility Franchise No. 1733 Renewal from the State of Washington, Department of Transportation for the construction, operation and maintenance of 15 temporary access vaults for the relining of an existing 24 inch watermain in SR 99 (Aurora Avenue North) between North 145th Street and North 185th Street in King County.
